message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $14,000 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $15,000, but that's my maximum
